title: Dreaming of You - A Good Omens Animatic
author: Ineffably Bored
comment: David and Michael are literally just Aziraphale and Crowley at this point and it makes me so happy 💖

Aziraphale doesn’t sleep because he keeps on dreaming about Crowley /hc 

I love how you drew Crowley going along with Aziraphale’s dream- he wants to make them come true :,)

Wow, so David, Michael and the Staged writers are playing with our GO-shipping minds. 😂 I love them!!! 

Awesome vid and drawings!!! THANK YOU!
This is amazing! I loved it. How'd you voice them? They sound like the real actors!
As a former Whovian who was absolutely obsessed with 10, seeing Tennant in the role of Crowley just makes my heart swell and it's just....wonderful-
description:
There may be a reason we only ever hear about Crowley sleeping rather than Aziraphale given the nature of the angel's dreams.


The audio is from an exchange between Michael Sheen (Aziraphale) and David Tennant (Crowley) on the BBC show 'Staged'.
